::FireStrike::
FireStrike, already being as high as the roof, swung his massive 
blue-flame covered sword at Slaughter on the roof.  Blue flame jumped of 
the swordas he swung it.

ilovealllizards@... wrote:

> Slaughter had bitten off one of Shokaract's crab legs that protruded from
> his arm. He didn't pay attention to it, though.
> 
> Shokaract: You must remember this, a kiss is still a kiss, a sigh is just a
> sigh...
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@...>
> To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
> Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 6:30 PM
> Subject: Re: Decepticon Base
> 
> 
>  > OOC: Whoa!  It certainly looks like Slaughter is between a boulder and a
>  > very hard place.  Since just entering the Decepticon base, he's went from
>  > the frying pan into the fire!  I lost Skulletron once, I won't have him
>  > ressurected into Slaughter and be lost again!
>  >
>  > IC:  Slaughter was getting desperately hungry, and had to eat soon or he
>  > would die, but he also had to avoid being blown to pieces.  Many
> projectile
>  > explosives were being shot at him.  Slaughter was hit by 15 rifle shots
> from
>  > FireStrike, and this time only a few bits of flesh flew off, but slime
> still
>  > flew everywhere like normal.  Slaughter got away from Stratus.  He
> forward,
>  > but high enough, and stuck his pincirs into the ceiling, then acted like
>  > their was sticky things on his hands, and quickly went across the 
> ceiling,
>  > avoiding the mega missile, and the rockets, and all shots that were 
> headed
>  > at him(sorry for missing all those shots, but I didn't want my new
> favourite
>  > character to die!)
>  >
>  >     Slaughter jumped down from the ceiling, onto the floor again.
>  >
>  >      "HUNGRY!!!" Was the only thing Slaughter seemed to be, and be 
> able to
>  > say.
>  >
>  >       Slaughter lunged at Shokaract, opening his jaw to try and take a
> bite
>  > out of Shokaract.
>  >
>  >
